# vDSP_DFT_Direction.FORWARD

**Case**

A constant that specifies a forward transform.

## Declaration

```swift
case FORWARD
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_DFT_Direction/FORWARD] to transform a signal from the time domain to the frequency domain.

## Constants

- **vDSP_DFT_Direction.INVERSE**: A constant that specifies an inverse transform.

items.description: A constant that specifies an inverse transform.
